data.title: Sarah Silverman
data.meta_description: Sarah Silverman is a comedian, writer, singer, guitarist and actress. She is best known for her exploitative comedy show The Sarah Silverman Program which addresses social taboos and controversial topics. She is also noted for dating fellow comedian Jimmy Kimmel.
data.text:
Sarah Silverman is a comedian, writer, singer, guitarist and actress. She is best known for her exploitative comedy show The Sarah Silverman Program which addresses social taboos and controversial topics. She is also noted for dating fellow comedian Jimmy Kimmel.

Silverman started performing standup at age 17 in a comedy restaurant and later attended New York University and continued her stand-up in Greenwich Village. Her career credits include a role on SNL from 1993â€“94 as a writer and player, though none of her sketches ever aired, as well as a recurring role on Larry Sanders for its last two seasons. Silverman was a featured performer on the HBO sketch comedy show Mr. Show (1995-97) and she also made guest appearances on Seinfeld, Star Trek: Voyager, Greg the Bunny and Crank Yankers.

Her film credits include small roles in There's Something About Mary, Say It Isn't So, School of Rock, The Way of the Gun, Overnight Delivery, Screwed, Heartbreakers, Evolution, School for Scoundrels and Rent.
